Key Match Events: Charith Asalanka took 3 wickets, including crucial dismissals of Shivam Dube and Arshdeep Singh.
Dunith Wellalage scored 67 runs, his best ODI score.
Axar Patel and Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets each for India.
The match ended in a tie with both teams scoring 230 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed disappointment at not being able to secure the win, mentioning the lack of consistent momentum and the fair result of the tie.
Rohit Sharma noted the pitch conditions, stating it was not easy to play shots and required digging in.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.
Sri Lanka captain Charith Asalanka won the toss and opted to bat first.
The game saw several high-pressure moments, including India needing just 1 run from 14 balls with 2 wickets in hand.
